file_content.text: Gear up! Three minutes to landfall.
This is it, Lana. Any reports from the battlefield?
Alliance forces are pinned down. Vaylin's pulling out all the stops to conquer Voss.
She's too eager to show off her strength.
Vaylin is overconfident.
The Empress has big shoes to fill.
And like her brother and father, Vaylin's overconfidence will be her undoing.
We'll cut her down to size.
It's going to be rough out there. I may need a kiss for good luck.
[Flirt] I'll need some luck.
You don't need luck.
That's not the point.
Ahem.
She's risking everything for a neutral world with little strategic value. Why?
Why conquer Voss?
Maybe she's luring us into a conflict, testing the Alliance's strength.
Big mistake.
The Empress won't escape this battle alive.
Voss will be her tomb.
Unfortunately, Vaylin's not joining the battle. She's afraid.
She better be.
Torian. What's your status?
Mandalorians are ready to follow the Alliance Commander into battle.
I can think of no better warriors to join our fight.
I'm honored to lead them.
Wait till you see them in action.
Jurkad ti kote.
[Flirt] Fight with glory.
Your Mando'a still needs some work.
Is the great Torian Cadera ready to give the Eternal Empire a black eye?
Are you ready for battle?
I'll give 'em more than a black eye.
I expect your warriors to carve Vaylin's army to pieces.
They'd better be bloodthirsty.
If you want slaughter, they'll deliver.
The troops are waiting. Time to get their blood boiling.
You joined the Alliance to fight for freedom. To protect the galaxy from oppression. Today, we will show our enemy the power of our united strength.
We fight for peace!
Empress Vaylin seeks to conquer Voss. It is our duty to defend the planet and drive off the cruel army of the Eternal Empire!
For the Alliance!
Why do we fight? Because war's in our blood. Because we hope for a safer galaxy. Because we choose to fight. But Voss had no choice.
Voss depends on us!
Empress Vaylin will burn this planet to ash--unless we stop her. Today we save Voss. Tomorrow, the galaxy!
For Voss!
Mandalorians, warriors of the Alliance. You've served many masters, but today you serve me. Together we'll strike a blow against the Eternal Empire.
Destroy our enemies!
Empress Vaylin has declared war on Voss. Your mission is simple: hunt down her forces and wipe out every last one of them!
Kill them all!
Our forces await your command.
Your sovereignty cannot be denied, Empress. But the Voss are a stubborn and territorial species. Brute force may impede our hunt.
You're right, SCORPIO. Where are my manners?
Give them a five-second head start. Then burn the planet to ash.
Don't worry. We've got this...
Get down!
Commander! Vaylin launched her attack early! We need you--now!
Hold your ground, Theron. The Alliance is on its way!
Three minutes to landfall!
This is it, Lana. Give me our status report.
She's hammering the planet with the full might of the Eternal Empire.
If you want to rally the troops, it's now or never!
Charge!
Lovely. Begin the hunt--and torch the planet behind you. When Voss falls, the entire galaxy will beg to serve me.
On second thought, run! I'll cover you!
We're coming in for landing. Brace yourselves!
Three minutes to landfall, Commander. Ground troops stand ready to follow you into battle.
We'll touch down in the city and lead the liberation of Voss. But Vaylin won't make it easy for us...
Get your people to safety!
I'll hold them off!
Empress Vaylin. The Eternal Empire has taken Voss.
I read you, Theron. Hold your ground and defend the city.
The Alliance is on its way!
We're coming in fast! Brace yourselves!
All ships! Fire on the Eternal Fleet!
Draw their attention away from the surface!
On second thought, run!
With you by my side, Vaylin doesn't stand a chance.
[Flirt] We'll stop her--together.
I hope you're right, for Voss' sake.
